title: Premium Living: Luxury hotel chains expand branded residences on rising demand
description: Luxury hotel chains in India are expanding their branded residences portfolio to cater to high-net-worth individuals. Marriott International, Hilton and EIH are among the companies involved. The demand is driven by the real estate market and the wealth of HNIs.
